description:
This time they`ll be going into Chain Chronicle. The three of them are excited to go into their first RPG, but when they see an entrance that`s different than usual, they`re very upset.  When they get inside the game, they`re attacked by a monster, and have trouble cooperating and fighting back...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Buki Kyouka no Seikouritsu 50%, Taikan de wa 15% Setsu
Weapon Enhancement Succeeds at a 50% Rate, but It Sure Feels Like 15% to Me.
武器強化の成功率50%,体感では15%説
